results.title: Metformin/rosiglitazone combination pill (Avandamet) for the treatment of patients with Type 2 diabetes.
results.text_hl: As @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@ is a pathophysiologic cornerstone of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ and @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular disease@@@, the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_rosiglitazone_metformin_combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:C471074 @@@Avandamet@@@ represents an optimal approach to the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

citations.NLM: Smiley D, Umpierrez G. Metformin/rosiglitazone combination pill (Avandamet) for the treatment of patients with Type 2 diabetes. Expert Opin Pharmacother. 2007 Jun;8(9):1353-64. PMID: 17563269
